name: Artefact
slogan: Marketing that is well versed in the most advanced technology to create cash flow
description:
A marketing agency built on the perfect union of marketers and engineers. Technology has transformed consumer lives
A new breed of brands such as Google, Amazon, Netflix and Airbnb have captured consumers’ hearts & minds by disrupting the status quo across all sectors. These brands have defined higher standards of customer experience by continuously improving their products and services through digital media, data & AI. All brands must now live up to these new standards. Their strategic mediation and operational skills will allow you to take a fresh look at the project that you’ve entrusted us with.

jobs.title: Data Application Engineer
jobs.description:
Who are we ?

Artefact is a consulting firm specialized in AI and Data, we are convinced that marketing cannot be optimized without engineering and technology, that’s why we described ourselves as “marketing engineers”. To improve the performance and impact of brands, and the experience that consumers have, we gather lots of different talents : data application engineer, data scientists, creatives and designers, advertising strategists and consultants. In only four years, Artefact has become one of the international reference of Data and IA expertise. The society count today more than 1000 collaborators worldwide, in 17 countries and gathers 3 complementary offers : Data Consulting, digital marketing expertise and the deployment of technologies (Big Data and Artificial Intelligence). 

To support and develop its growth, Artefact is looking for the next talents of the data divizion to join the engineering team. Organized in feature team, you will work in project mode (ou pizza team) to  advise your clients on their IA problematics, machine learning and Big Data. The projects you will work on can go from the migration of infrastructures to the Cloud (Deezer) to the construction of a predictive model  of the water rises (Greenpeace). 

Your responsibilities:

Innovate. You will work with your team which is made up of consultants, data scientists, creatives and engineers to identify your clients needs and define innovatives solutions. 

Build. You own the solution from start to end. You manage both conception and implementation, whilst also optimising the performance and scalability.  

Train. You work in a collaborative  team which champions knowledge sharing. You will coach others, keep abreast of industry news/updates and get stuck into training sessions with our business partners and suppliers, such as Google & Amazon. 

Communication. You share your successes through conferences, interviews, and press releases. You are also able to explain your work to make it accessible to less technicals profiles. 

Your mindset 

Curious, you are always seeking innovative solutions for your clients. You are involved in all the value chain which can be, front-end, back-end, big data infrastructure, ML model … 
Sharing of knowledges is essential for you and you actively participate in the diffusion of informations within Artefact (seminaries, formations, certifications)
Entrepreneurial, you bring solutions, new ideas, within your team at Artefact 

Profile :

You act on all the value chain of projects (infrastructures and platforms creation, data collection, application of machine learning models, APIs REST creations, of front-ends, of tests, continuous deployments)
You have a  good knowledge of python (Java and Scala are an asset), you know how to navigate *nix thank to CLI, you are familiar or have already used  cloud technologies such as GCP or AWS, you have already used bug data technologies like Flink, Spark, or Beam and Docker (K8S is an asset)
You can popularize technical terms or solutions to more business oriented profiles, you can work in a team with very diversified profiles
You know how to prioritize your tasks, respect deadlines, prevent in case of problems 
You can manage a team, coach juniors, identify their axes of progress
You can anticipate risks projects, you moderate risks when choosing for a technology 
You have a good level of english

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Who we are

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

We’re looking for talented and highly motivated Senior Software Engineers with a passion for technology and problem solving to join our team and work on a number of applied data science problems.

 

What you will be doing

Invent, implement, test, deploy, maintain and improve our products
Manage tasks and priorities independently
Create optimized solutions that can scale up
Participate in the life of the team and have fun!
What we are looking for

Minimum 2 years of programming experience in Python and Linux
Engineering degree, ideally in Computer Science
Excellent communication skills to understand, synthesize and explain complex problems in a simple way
Autonomy in the design and implementation of new solutions
 

Appreciated skills

Experience with Big Data technologies: MongoDB, Cassandra, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ, Hadoop stack (HDFS, Kafka, Spark,…)
Development of web interfaces: Django, Flask, AngularJS, React
Experience in an Agile environment, ideally Scrum
 

Why you should join us

Artefact is the place to be: come and build the future of marketing
Progress: every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
Culture: join the best team you could ever imagine
Entrepreneurship: you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!
 

Come join us!

jobs.title: Technical SEO Manager
jobs.description: ### Who we are Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth. Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe. We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client. ### Role purpose You will be responsible for managing the day-to-day client relationship and for the delivery of SEO campaigns for your clients. You will manage a number of clients, partnering with them to drive strategy and account profitability and to grow your business by 20% year on year. You will work with a cross-channel team, delegating work effectively to ensure it is always of the highest possible standard and to ensure client retention and satisfaction. ### Main responsibilities **Client management** - Manage the relationship between the agency and number of clients - Work with the Senior Account Manager and Account Director to develop a business growth plan for your clients, ensuring 20% year on year growth and a strategy plan for existing business that meets client needs - Ensure delivery against the agreed business growth and strategy plan - Maintain client retention and satisfaction, retaining 80% of your clients and maintaining a client satisfaction score of 8/10 - Run monthly business reviews for each of your clients - Project-manage and deliver end-to-end SEO campaign performance - Monitor campaign performance, timelines and budgets and report on these regularly to the account director and the client - Manage the day-to-day relationship with clients, building and maintaining strong working relationships so that they trust and value your opinions - Liaise with clients regularly (responding to briefs, attending meetings, status reporting, information seeking, managing milestones and approvals) - Identify and resolve issues before they arise - Give good strategic advice to clients based upon previous experience - Manage and work collaboratively with cross channel teams to ensure the best result for your clients **** **SEO delivery** - Lead the delivery of on-site and off-site SEO campaigns for key client accounts in order to increase performance and drive success based on agreed KPI’s - Proactively recommend changes to drive campaign success and ensure these are delivered effectively by your team - Lead your team in the delivery of complex web migrations and international SEO strategies - Lead your team in the production of advanced and detailed keyword research to identify the most effective and targeted key phrases for each client’s SEO campaign - Proactively define best practice methodology and ensure it is applied to all campaigns - Lead your team in the production of detailed technical SEO reports, using a variety of proprietary and 3rd party reporting tools for existing and potential customers. Present the results of these reports to stakeholders - Use a variety of analytical tools to assess competitor activity and profiles, establish client share of voice and spot opportunities for growth - Understand the client’s products and services, and use this to drive client search marketing campaign and objectives - Carry out objective testing of SEO tools resources and techniques - Regularly monitor client websites, SERPs and analytics tools and feedback on any significant changes - Proactively seek training and continuing professional development to stay up to date with developments, algorithm updates and process changes. **Leadership & management** - Ensure that everyone you manage has regular appraisals, clear objectives and a career plan to work towards and that they have the skills required to meet your client’s objectives ### Skills required **Essential** - Three years’ SEO agency experience - Broad digital marketing knowledge with an in-depth understanding of search marketing and the factors that influence client websites, search profiles and performance. Record of applying this knowledge to achieve results for clients - Awareness of and active integration with other digital channels such as PPC, Display and UX - Ability to multi-task in a fast-moving environment - Excellent project management and campaign leadership skills, with experience of managing budgets, estimates and schedules - Strong client management skills with the proven ability to add value to clients - Strong problem-solving/troubleshooting skills - Strong knowledge of excel ### Desirable - Management experience - Experience of running projects of £50k + from start to finish ### Technical - Basic HTML / CSS / JavaScript or Jquery knowledge - Experience with SEO tools such as Screaming Frog, OnCrawl, SEMrush, aHREFs, Brightedge, GetStat, Linkdex and Moz, - Experience with Google Analytics, Omniture, Site Catalyst (or other analytics tools), Google and Bing Search Console and SEO performance measurement using these tools - Basic knowledge of Google Tag Manager and tag creation. - Detailed understanding of technical SEO best practice including HTML meta tags, URL structure, schema.org markup for desktop and mobile search - Knowledge of robots control and site indexing principles including robots.txt, meta robots tags, canonical tag, XML sitemaps - Up-to-date knowledge of key search algorithms and google best practice guidelines. - Ability to identify low quality SEO practices such as link building or cloaking. - Experience developing organic search strategies including site architecture changes, robots control, schema.org - Experience with writing HTTP redirect rules for website migration strategies including Apache (including HTTPS migrations) - Experience writing HREF Lang mark-up and developing international SEO strategies. - Appreciation of UX best practice principles and how these should align with SEO recommendations - Solid understanding of parameter handling, pagination, filtering and duplicate content solutions - Experience with SEO KPI definition

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
### Marketing Intern

### Reports to

New Business and Marketing Lead

**Who we are;**

Created in 2014 out of a desire to dispel monotonous marketing tasks by using data fuelled AI, Artefact has been pursuing its mission at speedlight. In 2017, we merged with Netbooster to become one of the biggest independent digital media agencies in the world. 25 offices across 17 countries, with 1000+ employees delivering three service offers: Data Consulting, Digital Marketing Expertise and Technology Development (Big Data and Artificial Intelligence).

Artefact was awarded the most innovative agency of 2017.

Coining ourselves ‘Marketing Engineers’ we have a portfolio of 600 clients, including 100+ blue chip brands such as Accor Hotels, Orange, Carrefour, Emirates, Deutsche Telekom and Monoprix, all of whom rely on our profound marketing experience and capability to combine the creative with the scientific.  
 We’re 4 years old, we’re 100M$+ market capped and we’re hungry for more.

### Role purpose

At Artefact we have firmly put clients at the centre of our agency. As a Marketing Intern you will support the New Business and Marketing team in driving initiatives that result in happy clients and new business opportunities.

The role of the Marketing Intern will be to assist with the day-to-day delivery and implementation of the marketing and new business strategies, within the timeframes and budgets set.

This opportunity will suit an aspiring marketeer to excel in a fast paced, growing business. You will be exposed to all aspects of marketing gaining hands-on experience and directly affecting the growth of the business.

### Main Responsibilities

### The role will be varied but will cover the following areas:

- New Business support
- Marketing content support
- Event support

### Main duties will include:

- Analysing and reviewing prospecting/contacts lists to identify opportunities for growth.
- Assisting in running and executing our client event plan. Supporting the co-ordination and execution of one sector event per month.
- Managing day-to-day administration, co-ordination and maintenance of marketing collateral and sales/pitch materials.
- Co-ordinating award entries.
- Supporting internal communications and events.
- Monitoring competitor activity.
- Generating monthly insights reports/slides.
- Managing branded communications across social media.

 

### Skills and experience

- Excellent communicator.
- Excellent team worker and ability to use own initiative.
- Ideally, experience of working in a fast-paced environment.
- Some project or campaign management experience.
- Creativity and writing skills.
- Excellent Attention to detail.
- Experience using Google Docs/Google Sheets.

jobs.title: Senior Data Engineer
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

As a Senior Data Scientist Engineer, your role will encompass:

- Leading  and conducting ambitious projects in the transformation of clients through data
- Having a contributor role in raising the level of competencies of the data science team
- Harnessing the expertise from the other Divisions (Activation, Creativity, and Strategy) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Developing privileged relationships with our clients, using your technical abilities to assist in the transformation of their marketing department
- You’ll also participate in international projects. Business travel is something you enjoy!

Among your responsibilities as Senior Data Scientist Engineer, you will be responsible for:

**Leading data projects**

- Managing the resources on your projects to ensure challenges and skills are well match
- Securing delivery on your projects
- Communicating the successes of your projects among the company
- Working closely with your Consulting counterpart to build and maintain strong relationships with your clients and best understand their needs
- Caring for the happiness of the team, ensuring work is delivered to a high standard and providing feedback and mentoring

**Being a great tech role model**

- Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients’ initiatives
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Sharing best practices and contributing to Artefact’s institutional knowledge
- Embodying Artefact’s values and inspiring others to do the same

**Qualifications: Education & experience required**

- A Master’s degree in machine learning, mathematics, computer science, or related fields
- 2+ years of hands-on experience developing and applying data-driven solutions in a corporate or consulting setting, preferably in a consumer marketing context (experience in the web industry is a plus)
- Strong experience and knowledge of computer science, data processing, algorithms, and data architecture
- Experience leading  a technical project in a business context
- Intellectual curiosity and excellent problem-solving skills, including the ability to structure and prioritise an approach for maximum impact

**What we are looking for**

- **A Doer:**  you get things done and inspire your teams to do the same
- **An Analyst: ** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts
- **A Pragmatist:**  you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins
- **A Mentor:**  your clients and teams naturally seek for advice
- **An Adventurer: ** you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for problems to solve

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: (Junior) Account Manager (m/f/d) Affiliate Marketing
jobs.description:
### **Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing**

- Supporting and advising our national and international clients regarding their partner program activities
- Setting up and managing national and international affiliate campaigns, from budget planning and administration, campaign analysis, to evaluation and ongoing monitoring of advertising success
- Developing new strategies for the successful expansion and optimization of the programs
- Detecting potential fraud attempts by publishers within the framework of program management and implementing appropriate counter-measures
- Taking care of your client base and continuously expanding it over time which includes meetings with your clients on a monthly and/or quarterly basis

 

**What we are looking for**

- A degree (Bachelor / Master) in business administration with focus on marketing and / or communication or a similar educational background
- 2 to 3 years of professional experience in Affiliate Marketing and profound knowledge of the customary networks and publisher segments
- Excellent conceptual and analytical skills, as well as an affinity for numbers
- Communication skills and a high level of initiative
- Always keeping an eye on trends and innovations
- MS Office skills, especially Excel and PowerPoint
- Fluent German and English skills both oral and written, an additional language is a plus
   

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: (Junior) Data Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
**(Junior) Data Engineer (m/f/d)**

 

**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

 

**What you will be doing**

With the support of a senior consultant, you will have the opportunity to carry out various projects independently and in collaboration with Artefact’s teams of experts: Strategy, Activation, Analytics, Data, Creation.  
 At the agency or at the client’s premises, the consultant is a true project manager. The diversity of your missions will allow you to be as close as possible to customer issues, to acquire a real knowledge of data and to quickly develop your skills.

Your missions will include:

- define the needs of its customers by conducting interviews with customer teams and multiple technology partners,
- to help build, formulate and present strategic data recommendations for the client,
- to organize and conduct workshops and training to ensure the success of its projects,
- to develop and present data recommendations to clients,
- to imagine and present new support proposals to convince our future customers,
- to participate in training courses to acquire the technical knowledge necessary for its mission as an advisor and to keep abreast of the latest technological innovations on the market,
- and finally to participate in the writing of content on transversal subjects (e.g. publication of research works, writing articles or business cases).

 

**What we are looking for**

Graduated from a business school (desired), the most important qualities in our eyes are intellectual curiosity, autonomy and dynamism.

A first knowledge of digital marketing (within a start-up, agency, etc.) or consulting (Strategy, Management, IS), will obviously be valued.

 

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Assistant Accountant
jobs.description:
### **Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**Role Purpose**

Working alongside our Senior Management Accountant you will immerse yourself within our Finance team here at Artefact. Your goal will be to assist in the provision of first class financial accounting for the business and process the accounts up to trial balance.

** Responsibilities include:**

- Month end analysis (including revenue) and journal preparations.
- Balance Sheet reconciliations.
- Preparing month end estimate/reporting templates.
- Supporting the monthly forecasting process.
- Assisting with credit control.
- Assisting and supporting the Finance Director and Senior Management Accountant in their decision making with production of Ad hoc analysis, gathering data for audit etc
- Assist in preparation of statutory accounts and Tax
- Posting expenses
- Liaising with client teams to ensure POs are received for relevant clients
- Responsible for petty cash, including reconciliations at month end
- Processing pension payments 
- ONS submissions
- Reporting to the Senior Management Accountant

 

**Our Dream hire will have:**

- The ability to manage and prioritise multiple workloads 
- Excellent attention to detail
- The Ability to challenge and suggest improvements to the existing processes
- The Ability to work with/alongside non-finance professionals
- A Strong academic background
- Either a Part Qualified Accountant or Graduate
- Excel skills up to VLOOKUP/SUMIFS level
- SAP experience is desirable 

###

jobs.title: Consulting Manager
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

Reporting directly to the Partner Consulting, your role will be :

- Bring the best of our expertise from the other Departments to your clients on Data Science, Activation ( e.g., media buying, CRM, …) and Creativity.
- Impact-driven with real sales abilities, you will have to embark our clients into a transformation of their marketing department and make sure Artefact/NetBooster is their preferred partner in this endeavour.

Among your responsibilities as Consulting Manager, you will :

**Develop client portfolio (hunting)**

- Build a commercial strategy to develop the country client portfolio (consulting is a very good step in the door) through personal contacts, events, cold calls, …
- Monitor the commercial pipeline
- Build proposals supporting the client needs

**Strengthen our relationships with current clients (farming)**

- Develop the consulting offer with existing clients, especially with Activation or Data clients
- Create opportunities for other Departments with your clients (Data Science, Activation, Creativity)

**Deliver the highest standards of quality on your projects**

- Pilot multidisciplinary teams (consultants, data scientists, strategic planners, media traders)
- Ensure the highest level of quality of output to your clients
- Accountable for the success of the projects from a client and team perspective

**Develop our Global Knowledge platform**

- Build stronghold of knowledge through your clients engagements (frameworks, methodologies, technologies, …)
- Ensure the spread of the Consulting Department knowledge across the company at local and Global level (in coordination with the Consulting Practice)

**What we are looking for**

You have demonstrated success in your first 3+ years of career at a tier 1 consulting firm and have 2+ years of experience managing projects and/or clients.

- **HUNTER​ :**  you identify business opportunities and enjoy
- **ANALYTIC​ : ** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts
- **MOVER AND SHAKER​ : ** you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins
- **AUTONOMOUS​ :**  you’re an entrepreneur…

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Consulting Manager
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

Reporting directly to the Partner Consulting, your role will be :

- Bring the best of our expertise from the other Departments to your clients on Data Science, Activation ( e.g., media buying, CRM, …) and Creativity.
- Impact-driven with real sales abilities, you will have to embark our clients into a transformation of their marketing department and make sure Artefact/NetBooster is their preferred partner in this endeavour.

Among your responsibilities as Consulting Manager, you will :

**Develop client portfolio (hunting)**

- Build a commercial strategy to develop the country client portfolio (consulting is a very good step in the door) through personal contacts, events, cold calls, …
- Monitor the commercial pipeline
- Build proposals supporting the client needs

**Strengthen our relationships with current clients (farming)**

- Develop the consulting offer with existing clients, especially with Activation or Data clients
- Create opportunities for other Departments with your clients (Data Science, Activation, Creativity)

**Deliver the highest standards of quality on your projects**

- Pilot multidisciplinary teams (consultants, data scientists, strategic planners, media traders)
- Ensure the highest level of quality of output to your clients
- Accountable for the success of the projects from a client and team perspective

**Develop our Global Knowledge platform**

- Build stronghold of knowledge through your clients engagements (frameworks, methodologies, technologies, …)
- Ensure the spread of the Consulting Department knowledge across the company at local and Global level (in coordination with the Consulting Practice)

**What we are looking for**

You have demonstrated success in your first 3+ years of career at a tier 1 consulting firm and have 2+ years of experience managing projects and/or clients.

- **HUNTER​ :**  you identify business opportunities and enjoy

- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Content and online PR marketer
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specializing in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing**

- Work together with our Senior Content Marketing Strategist on the execution of content strategies.
- Writing SEO optimized content for our diverse clients.
- Review onpage optimizations made by the client.
- Reach out to publications that are relevant for our clients and share our content or try to get them to link to our content.
- Earn relevant links to landing pages of our clients. This can mean that you might be brainstorming creative content marketing campaigns and write press releases.
- Support clients with their PR (online).
- Follow-up performances, reports and budgets.
- Train employees of our clients on SEO content.

**What we are looking for**

- **Your values**

  - **Empathy**  : *You value our coworker’s feelings first*
  - **Collaboration** : *You believe people are smarter as a diverse team*
  - **Engagement** : *You are biased to action*
  - **Data and web culture** : You believe that *everything starts with data*
  - **Customer obsession** : *You go the extra mile for our clients*

- **Your Education**

    - Bachelor degree in the digital sector, marketing or communication.

- **Your Experience**

    - A first experience in a similar position would be a plus.

- **Your Skills**

  - Knowledge of the impact of keywords and content on SEO.
  - Knowledge of the impact of different channels in the content strategy.
  - Excellent copywriting skills.
  - Knowledge of what a good inbound link looks like.
  - MS Office mastery (PPT, Excel)
  - Excellent communication and persuasiveness (written & oral)

- **Your Language Mastery**

  - Fluent in Dutch and English, mastering a third language would be a plus.

**Why you should join us**

- **Place to be** : data and its application in marketing is a hot topic, the type of success that everyone wants on their resume
- **Knowledge** : with Artefact you will build a true technical expertise while leveraging the methodologies and rigor of consulting
- **Entrepreneurs** : you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent into this industry!

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

As a Senior Data Scientist, your role will encompass:

- Leading  and conducting ambitious projects in the transformation of clients through data
- Having a contributor role in raising the level of competencies of the data science team
- Harnessing the expertise from the other Divisions (Activation, Creativity, and Strategy) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Developing privileged relationships with our clients, using your technical abilities to assist in the transformation of their marketing department
- You’ll also participate in international projects. Business travel is something you enjoy!

Among your responsibilities as Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for:

**Leading data projects**

- Managing the resources on your projects to ensure challenges and skills are well match
- Securing delivery on your projects
- Communicating the successes of your projects among the company
- Working closely with your Consulting counterpart to build and maintain strong relationships with your clients and best understand their needs
- Caring for the happiness of the team, ensuring work is delivered to a high standard and providing feedback and mentoring

**Being a great tech role model**

- Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients’ initiatives
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Sharing best practices and contributing to Artefact’s institutional knowledge
- Embodying Artefact’s values and inspiring others to do the same

**Qualifications: Education & experience required**

- A Master’s degree in machine learning, mathematics, computer science, or related fields
- 2+ years of hands-on experience developing and applying data-driven solutions in a corporate or consulting setting, preferably in a consumer marketing context (experience in the web industry is a plus)
- Strong experience and knowledge of data processing, data modeling, algorithms, and data architecture
- Experience leading  a technical project in a business context
- Intellectual curiosity and excellent problem-solving skills, including the ability to structure and prioritise an approach for maximum impact

**What we are looking for**

- **A Doer:**  you get things done and inspire your teams to do the same
- **An Analyst: ** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts
- **A Pragmatist:**  you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins
- **A Mentor:**  your clients and teams naturally seek for advice
- **An Adventurer: ** you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for problems to solve

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

jobs.title: Data Scientist Manager
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

Reporting directly to the country Head of data & Technology, your role will encompass:

- Building the vision for the Data Science of the company and managing the data science team  in a day to day role
- Playing a preponderant role in raising the level of competencies of the data science team
- Leading  ambitious projects in the transformation of clients through data
- Harnessing the expertise from the other Divisions (Activation, Creativity, and Strategy) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Developing privileged relationships with our clients’ C-level executives, using your technical abilities to assist in the transformation of their marketing department, and ensuring that Artefact/NetBooster is their preferred partner in this endeavour

Among your responsibilities as Manager Data Scientist, you will be responsible for:

**Managing the country’s Data team**

- Managing the resources to ensure challenges and skills are well matched
- Ensuring each individual’s continuous development and well-being within the team
- Securing delivery on client projects
- Promoting the Division’s brand, communicating its successes and results at country level (ex: through events and PR)
- Working with the managers of Consulting to build and maintain strong relationships with your clients and best understand their strategic and tactical needs

**Developing Artefact’s technical expertise**

- Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients’ initiatives
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Working with Artefact’s partners to understand and leverage the latest technologies
- Sharing best practices and contributing to Artefact’s institutional knowledge

**Being a great tech manager**

- Leading by example, embodying Artefact’s values and inspiring others to do the same
- Caring for the happiness of your team whilst guiding them to be the best they can be, ensuring work is delivered to a high standard and providing feedback and mentoring
- Knowing the role of a manager in a team’s success

**Qualifications: Education & experience required**

- A Master’s degree in machine learning, mathematics, computer science, or related fields
- 3+ years of hands-on experience developing and applying data-driven solutions in a corporate or consulting setting, preferably in a consumer marketing context (experience in the web industry is a plus)
- Strong experience and knowledge of data processing, data modeling, algorithms, and data architecture
- Experience managing a technical project in a business context
- Intellectual curiosity and excellent problem-solving skills, including the ability to structure and prioritise an approach for maximum impact

**What we are looking for**

- **A Doer:**  you get things done and inspire your teams to do the same
- **An Analyst: ** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts
- **A Pragmatist:**  you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins
- **A Mentor:**  your clients and teams naturally seek for advice
- **An Adventurer: ** you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for problems to solve

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

 

**What you will be doing**

- You look after your clients independently across all the online marketing channels
- In consideration  of the marketing and communication goals of your clients, you develop media strategies and plans
- You coordinate internal processes like every operative activity for all the channels (SEA, Affiliate, Display, Social Media) according to the defined strategy and time plan
- The research and processing of market and competition analyzes are also a part of your responsibilities
- You implement international projects by maintain a regular dialog with our global colleagues 
- You keep yourself up to date about the latest development in digital media
- You are responsible for the budget management for all the channels

 

**What we are looking for**

- You have already made experience in digital Marketing (operational and/or strategic), a knowledge of classic marketing would be an advantage
- You are able to create professional strategic recommendations because of your good knowledge about SEA, Affiliate Marketing, Display and/or Social Media
- Communication skills, service orientation and high level of initiative are a party of your strengths
- You have very good conceptual and analytical skills, moreover you have a high affinity for numbers
- Even in hectic times you and are able to prioritize your tasks and always keep a cool head 
- MS Office and G-Suites Skills, especially Google Sheets, Google Docs and Google Slied
- Fluent German and good English skills, an additional language is a plus
   

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Intern Data Consultant
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

 

**What you will be doing:**

You will join our Data & Consulting which helps clients transform and improve their marketing strategy by applying advanced analytics to generate value-creating insights from big data and artificial intelligence.

 

**Key responsibilities**

- Your primary focus will be to contribute to our data marketing consulting missions for our major clients, total involvement in projects from start to final recommendations
- You will be fully participating in one or more data oriented projects that will focus in leveraging the latest techniques and technologies to drive maximum business value with an emphasis on Sales and Marketing.
- You’ll take part in every steps of the project from initial client facing to the final delivery, you will help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products to our consumers.
- As a Data Marketing Consultant Intern, you will participate to human-scale data projects dealing with a variety of issues: data strategy, data-driven marketing and use cases, design thinking, governance and data organization, GDPR / ePrivacy compliance plan, data architecture and technology choice support, etc.
- Deliver top class presentation both from the materials produced in terms of formatting, content and communication skills  
- Participate in business meetings and contribute to move forward partnership agreements.

 

**Requirements & qualifications :**

- Currently pursuing a BA/BS or MA/MS in Business or a quantitative field (computer science, statistics, engineering, economics, or a related field) from an accredited college or university.
- 0-1 years of related experience supporting engineering, information technology or other technical operations. A first experience (internship, school project, Junior Entreprise, etc.) in consulting and/or data ecosystem would be a plus.
- Good understanding of the digital and data ecosystem and its technologies: web analytics, programmatic, DMP, Datalake, dataviz, data science, etc.
- Strong interest in marketing & business issues
- Intellectual curiosity, along with on excellent problem-solving skill, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions
- A practical and analytical mind-set, you will be passionate about the creation of bespoke solutions for our clients
- Continuously striving for high performance in all you do
- Good Communication skills
- Ideal candidates should be passionate about using business acumen along with big data and analytics to address real-world problems and drive significant change.

 

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

**Come join us!**

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

What you will be doing:

You will join our Data & Consulting which helps clients transform and improve their marketing strategy by applying advanced analytics to generate value-creating insights from big data and artificial intelligence.

Key responsibilities

  • Your primary focus will be to contribute to our data marketing consulting missions for our major clients, total involvement in projects from start to final recommendations
  • You will be fully participating in one or more data oriented projects that will focus in leveraging the latest techniques and technologies to drive maximum business value with an emphasis on Sales and Marketing.
  • You’ll take part in every steps of the project from initial client facing to the final delivery, you will help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products to our consumers.
  • As a Data Marketing Consultant Intern, you will participate to human-scale data projects dealing with a variety of issues: data strategy, data-driven marketing and use cases, design thinking, governance and data organization, GDPR / ePrivacy compliance plan, data architecture and technology choice support, etc.
  • Deliver top class presentation both from the materials produced in terms of formatting, content and communication skills
  • Participate in business meetings and contribute to move forward partnership agreements.

Requirements & qualifications :

  • Currently pursuing a BA/BS or MA/MS in Business or a quantitative field (computer science, statistics, engineering, economics, or a related field) from an accredited college or university.
  • 0-1 years of related experience supporting engineering, information technology or other technical operations. A first experience (internship, school project, Junior Entreprise, etc.) in consulting and/or data ecosystem would be a plus.
  • Good understanding of the digital and data ecosystem and its technologies: web analytics, programmatic, DMP, Datalake, dataviz, data science, etc.
  • Strong interest in marketing & business issues
  • Intellectual curiosity, along with on excellent problem-solving skill, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions
  • A practical and analytical mind-set, you will be passionate about the creation of bespoke solutions for our clients
  • Continuously striving for high performance in all you do
  • Good Communication skills
  • Ideal candidates should be passionate about using business acumen along with big data and analytics to address real-world problems and drive significant change.

Why you should join us

  • *Artefact is the place to be: * come and build the future of marketing
  • Progress: every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
  • Culture: join the best team you could ever imagine
  • *Entrepreneurship: * you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

Come join us!

jobs.title: Intern Data Engineer
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

 

**Your responsibilities :**  

- **Innovate**. You will work with your team which is made up of consultants, data scientists, creatives and engineers to identify your clients needs and define innovative solutions. 
- **Build.** You’ll take ownership of the solution from start to end. You manage both conception and implementation, whilst also optimising the performance and scalability.  
- **Train.** You will work in a collaborative  team which champions knowledge sharing. You will coach others, keep abreast of industry news/updates and get stuck into training sessions with our business partners and suppliers, such as Google & Amazon. 
- **Communication.** You will regularly attend events and conferences to share your knowledge, learnings and success, with the capability of presenting and communicating 

 

**Your mindset**

- Curious, you are always seeking innovative solutions for your clients. You are involved in all the value chain which can be, front-end, back-end, big data infrastructure, ML model … 
- Sharing of knowledge is essential for you and you actively participate in the diffusion of information within Artefact (seminaries, formations, certifications)
- Entrepreneurial, you bring solutions, new ideas, within your team at Artefact 

 

**Profile :**

- You act on all the value chain of projects (infrastructures and platforms creation, data collection, application of machine learning models, APIs REST creations, of front-ends, of tests, continuous deployments)
- You have a  good knowledge of python (Java and Scala are an asset), you know how to navigate *nix thank to CLI, you are familiar or have already used  cloud technologies such as GCP or AWS, you have already used bug data technologies like Flink, Spark, or Beam and Docker (K8S is an asset)
- You can popularize technical terms or solutions to more business oriented profiles, you can work in a team with very diversified profiles
- You know how to prioritize your tasks, respect deadlines, prevent in case of problems 
- You have a good level of English   
  

**Why join us :**

- Innovative projects and technologies, exciting
- Really competent team, co-progression guaranteed
- Strong ambition for the data department, full of progression opportunities (technical, management)
- Recent Stack : Python, Spark, React/Redux, Google Cloud Platform (BQ, Dataflow, Compute Engine…), Nifi, HDFS, Ansible, Docker, Redis, ... 

 

**Come join us !**

jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing**

You will join our Data Marketing Consulting team which helps clients transform and improve their marketing strategy by applying advanced analytics to generate value-creating insights from big data and artificial intelligence.

 

**Key responsibilities**

As a Data Scientist Intern, your role will encompass:

- Conducting ambitious projects in the transformation of clients through data
- Collaborating with the other Divisions (Activation, Creativity, and Strategy) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Developing privileged relationships with our clients, using your technical abilities to assist in the transformation of their marketing department

Among your responsibilities as a Data Scientist Intern, you will be responsible for:

**Performing data projects**

- Securing delivery on your projects
- Communicating your work and achievements among the team
- Working closely with your Consulting counterpart to build and maintain strong relationships with your clients and best understand their needs
- Ensuring that your solutions are bringing values to the client problematic
- Being a good team player, knowing your role and responsibility in the global ambition

**Being a great tech person**

- Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients’ initiatives
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Sharing best practices and contributing to Artefact’s institutional knowledge
- Embodying Artefact’s values and inspiring others to do the same

 

**What we are looking for**

- Currently pursuing a BA/BS or MA/MS in machine learning, mathematics, computer science, or related fields (computer science, statistics, engineering, economics, or a related field) from an accredited college or university.
- 0-1 years of related experience supporting engineering, information technology or other technical operations. A first experience (internship, school project, Junior Entreprise, etc.) in consulting and/or data ecosystem would be a plus.
- Good understanding of the digital and data ecosystem and its technologies: web analytics, programmatic, DMP, Datalake, dataviz, data science, etc.
- Strong interest in marketing & business issues
- Intellectual curiosity, along with on excellent problem-solving skill, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions
- A practical and analytical mind-set, you will be passionate about the creation of bespoke solutions for our clients
- Continuously striving for high performance in all you do
- Good Communication skills
- Ideal candidates should be passionate about using business acumen along with big data and analytics to address real-world problems and drive significant change.

 

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

 

**Come join us!**

- Sharing of knowledge is essential for you and you actively participate in the diffusion of information within Artefact (seminaries, formations, certifications)
- Entrepreneurial, you bring solutions, new ideas, within your team at Artefact 

**Profile :**

- You act on all the value chain of projects (infrastructures and platforms creation, data collection, application of machine learning models, APIs REST creations, of front-ends, of tests, continuous deployments)
- You have a  good knowledge of python (Java and Scala are an asset), you know how to navigate *nix thank to CLI, you are familiar or have already used  cloud technologies such as GCP or AWS, you have already used bug data technologies like Flink, Spark, or Beam and Docker (K8S is an asset)
- You can popularize technical terms or solutions to more business oriented profiles, you can work in a team with very diversified profiles
- You know how to prioritize your tasks, respect deadlines, prevent in case of problems 
- You have a good level of english   
  

**Why join us :**

- Innovative projects and technologies, exciting
- Really competent team, co-progression guaranteed
- Strong ambition for the data department, full of progression opportunities (technical, management)
- Recent Stack : Python, Spark, React/Redux, Google Cloud Platform (BQ, Dataflow, Compute Engine…), Nifi, HDFS, Ansible, Docker, Redis, ...

 

**Come join us!**

jobs.title: Junior Data Scientist
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**What you will be doing: Key responsibilities**

As a Junior Data Scientist, your role will encompass:

- Conducting ambitious projects in the transformation of clients through data
- Collaborating with the other Divisions (Activation, Creativity, and Strategy) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Developing privileged relationships with our clients, using your technical abilities to assist in the transformation of their marketing department

Among your responsibilities as a Junior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for:

**Performing data projects**

- Securing delivery on your projects
- Communicating your work and achievements among the team
- Working closely with your Consulting counterpart to build and maintain strong relationships with your clients and best understand their needs
- Ensuring that your solutions are bringing values to the client problematic
- Being a good team player, knowing your role and responsibility in the global ambition

**Being a great tech person**

- Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients’ initiatives
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Sharing best practices and contributing to Artefact’s institutional knowledge
- Embodying Artefact’s values and inspiring others to do the same

**Qualifications: Education & experience required**

- A Master’s degree in machine learning, mathematics, computer science, or related fields
- Hands-on experience developing and applying data-driven solutions in a corporate or consulting setting, preferably in a consumer marketing context (experience in the web industry is a plus)
- Strong knowledge of data processing, data modeling, algorithms, and data architecture
- Intellectual curiosity and excellent problem-solving skills, including the ability to structure and prioritise an approach for maximum impact

**What we are looking for**

- **A Doer:**  you get things done and inspire your teams to do the same
- **An Analyst: ** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts
- **A Pragmatist:**  you have a hacker mindset and always find the quick wins
- **A Mentor:**  your clients and teams naturally seek for advice
- **An Adventurer: ** you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for problems to solve

**Why you should join us**

- **Artefact is the place to be: ** come and build the future of marketing
- **Progress:**  every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- **Culture:**  join the best team you could ever imagine
- **Entrepreneurship: ** you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!

jobs.title: Manager Data & Analytics
jobs.description:
**Who we are**

Artefact is a new generation of data service providers, specializing in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organizations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.

Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

**Role profile:**

A passionate digital analytics leader, you are responsible for ensuring that we deliver excellence in data and analytics development, defining and delivering a clear vision and strategy for the development of this skill across the agency. You will make Artefact famous for the quality of our data analytics skills, building our reputation with senior clients, leading new business pitches and showcasing Artefact’s work and skills to the wider industry.

You will champion innovative thought and quality across our projects and with clients and will lead by example, by delivering client and new business work of the highest possible standard.

**New business and client work**

- Lead by example through delivering client and new business work of the highest possible standard as business need dictates.
- Develop robust, industry-leading measurement and analytics projects that enable clients with visibility across physical and digital customer journeys (online and offline)
- Planning, leading and delivering advanced analytics solutions for clients including e-commerce, 3rd party tool implementations, and advanced modeling.
- Identify and support the delivery of suitable statistical data analysis techniques, to provide recommendations for clients which exceed performance expectations and maximizes ROI
- Explore automation techniques that create efficiencies and improve ROI (both internally and for clients) such as scripting, tool development or better client reporting methods
- Act as an internal consultant on analytics for significant projects, helping other teams such as the media team to shape the very best solutions
- Lead through the ‘pitch ownership’ and by taking an ‘analytics lead’ role on new business pitches

 

**Data and Analytics leadership**

- Lead data analytics development, defining and communicating a clear strategy for the team and the value it will add to the agency
- Work together with the data consultants to champion analytics development and associated platforms on three fronts – internally to the agency, externally to clients and to represent Artefact’s position to the wider marketing community
- Lead and develop our analytics offering, process, and techniques and develop best practice documentation
- Develop review and sign off processes to ensure analytics work is always of the highest possible quality
- Responsible for Artefact being known as exceptional in analytics in the wider market. Actively seek to build Artefact’s profile within the digital marketing community, for example through speaking opportunities, blogs, networking, and conferences.

  **Skill & team development**

- Identify the skills Artefact needs to develop to be exceptional in your discipline. 
- Define the skills journey that will help Artefact achieve its analytics objectives and work with HR to develop and implement a plan to achieve this. Activities may include but are not limited to:

  - Delivery of training programs
  - Knowledge sharing
  - Mentoring on your discipline
- Act as a skills mentor to our analytics and data specialists and the wider agency, advising them on how to develop approaches to innovate and deal with challenges
- Guide/initiate meetings to provide knowledge sharing and channel leadership.

 

## **Qualifications: Education & experience required**

- An academic level of education (Bachelor or Master)
- A minimum of 5 years of work experience as a data specialist
- Verifiable knowledge and experience of web analytics platforms like Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, WebTrekk etc.
- Verifiable knowledge and experience of tag management systems like Google Tag Manager, Tag Commander, Tealium IQ Tag Management, Relay42 etc.
- Verifiable knowledge and experience of website optimization tools like Optimizely, Google Optimize, Convert, AB Tasty etc.
- Knowledge of Data Management Platforms like BlueKai, Krux, Ysance, Weborama, Relay42, Adobe Audience Manager, Tealium Audience Streams etc.
- Knowledge of computer and web-related technologies:

  - Network techniques/protocols
  - JavaScript, CSS and HTML (optionally AJAX, JSON, Angular)
  - Database techniques (REST API’s, SQL, No-SQL)
  - Cloud technology (Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure)
- Optionally, knowledge of data processing and data modeling algorithms and techniques  
  

**What we are looking for**

- **A Doer:** you get things done and inspire your team to do the same
- **An Analyst:** you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions based on facts
- **A Pragmatist:** you have a no-nonsense mindset that seeks for practical and realistic solutions
- **A Mentor:** your clients and colleagues naturally seek you out for advice
- **An Adventurer:** you’re an entrepreneur constantly looking for business opportunities

 

**Why you should join us**

- Artefact is the place to be: come and build the future of marketing
- Progress: every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn
- Culture: join the best team you could ever imagine
- Entrepreneurship: you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!
